node.nodeDescription: Throw a flask of acid that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.

node.nodeDescription: Throw a flask of acid that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

node.altText: {Poison Pool} applies a stack of poison to enemies standing in it each second.
node.description: Acid Flask leaves behind a {Poison Pool} for 4 seconds that poison enemies that stand in it and adds a 2 second cooldown per flask thrown.

node.altText: Poison Resistance Shred reduces poison resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
node.description: Acid Flask has a chance to shred enemy poison resistance on hit.
Acid Flask has additional chance to poison enemies on hit.

This effect has a 5 second cooldown.

node.nodeDescription: Throw a flask of acid that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

nodeList.description: Acid Flask deals additional fire damage.

node.description:
Acid Flask's base physical damage is doubled and converted to fire damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Acid Flask can no longer apply poison or create poison pools.
Acid Flask costs less mana.
Acid Flask has increased throwing speed.
Acid Flask has additional chance to poison enemies on hit.

node.nodeDescription: Throw a flask of acid that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

node.description: Acid Flask has a chance to slow enemies on hit. Slow caused by Acid Flask last longer.

node.nodeDescription: Throw a flask of acid that explodes on impact, poisoning enemies and reducing their armor.

nodeList.description: Acid Flask has a chance to ignite enemies.

node.altText: Fire Resistance Shred reduces poison resistance by 5% (2% against bosses and players), lasts 4 seconds, and can stack up to 20 times.
node.description: Converts Armor Shred from all sources that Acid Flask would apply to Fire Resistance Shred.

Acid Flask's base physical damage is doubled and converted to fire damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Acid Flask can no longer apply poison or create poison pools.
Acid Flask costs less mana.
Acid Flask has increased throwing speed.
Acid Flask has additional chance to poison enemies on hit.

node.description: Acid Flask has a chance to slow enemies on hit. Slow caused by Acid Flask last longer.
